title: Fix deployment error

requirements.text: Audit and fix all compilation and build errors preventing successful deployment. Ensure the Motoko backend actor compiles without errors and the React/TypeScript frontend builds cleanly. Replace any Next.js-specific constructs (App Router, next/image, next/font, etc.) with standard React equivalents compatible with the Vite-based Internet Computer stack.
acceptanceCriteria: The Motoko backend actor compiles without errors
The frontend builds without TypeScript or module resolution errors
No Next.js-specific imports or APIs are used anywhere in the frontend
The application deploys successfully to the Internet Computer network
All existing features (announcement bar, navbar, hero, procedures, dentistry, partners, services, doctors, consultation form, footer) remain fully functional after the fix

constraints: Do not remove or alter any existing feature functionality
All frontend code must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS â€” no Next.js APIs
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding new features or sections beyond what already exists
Changing the visual design or color scheme
Migrating to a different frontend framework
